last_episode_to_air.name: Billy on the Street with CHRIS EVANS!!! (And surprise guests!)

name: Billy on the Street
overview: Comedian Billy Eichner, unfiltered and unapologetic, hits the streets of New York City to test unsuspecting strangers on their knowledge of music and pop culture. With microphone in hand and money in tow, Eichner gives contestants the chance to win cash by answering a series of hilarious and spontaneous questions. The catch? The final round is subjective - Don't agree with Billy? You lose.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Billy Eichner takes to the streets to test the knowledge of unsuspecting pedestrians. Billy asks questions with his patented fast-paced and goofy style, covering topics from Lil' Wayne to Meryl Streep, for a fun time that is part game show and part comedy.

episodes.name: And Away We Go...
episodes.overview: Games include: "For A Dollar," "Sho Nuff or No He Didn't," and "Where In the World Is John Mayer's Penis"

episodes.name: Are You Smarter Than a Gay Fifth Grader?
episodes.overview: Games include: "Are You Smarter Than a Gay Fifth Grader?," "Is This a Real Tyler The Creator Lyric or Not?"

episodes.name: Can Rachel Dratch Name 20 White People in 30 Seconds?
episodes.overview:
Games include: Premiere of "Quizzed In the Face," "Get In the Snuggie" with Rachel Dratch, and "Amateur Speed Sketching"

Special guest: Rachel Dratch

episodes.name: The Meryl Streep Showdown
episodes.overview: Games include: "Quizzed In the Face," "For a Dollar," and "Missing Testicle or Extraterrestrial?"

episodes.name: Ask an Asian!
episodes.overview: Games include: "Quizzed In the Face" with a secret twist, Premiere of "Cash Face," and Billy releases his inspired James Blunt inspired single "You Look Really Good For You"

episodes.name: Where In the World Is Scarlett Johansson's Vagina?
episodes.overview: Games include: "Where In the World Is Scarlett Johanson's Vagina," and brings back "Sho Nuff Or No He Didn't"

episodes.name: Joan Rivers Gets Quizzed In the Face
episodes.overview:
Games include: "Quizzed in the Face" with Special Guest, and "Children's TV Show from the 80's or a Musician?"

Special guest: Joan Rivers

episodes.name: Drunk Rich
episodes.overview: Games include: "Quizzed In the Face," "Cash Face," and new game "Indian Or Not Indian?"

episodes.name: Did You Hear Madonna Died?
episodes.overview: Games include: "Quizzed In the Face," "Did You Hear Madonna Died?," and "Amateur Speed Sketching"

episodes.name: Television Is the Greatest Thing to Ever Happen to Me!
episodes.overview:
Games include: "Quizzed In the Face," "Rapper or Nic Cage Character?," and "British Person or Scientologist?"

Special guest: Mark Hoppus

episodes.name: Episode 1
Episode 2
Billy Meets Mr. Singh!
episodes.overview: Billy plays Celebrity Speed Sketching, Chris Brown or Serial Killer and Train Song or Mommy Blog?

episodes.name: The Lesbian Lightning Round, with Andy Cohen
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen takes the streets of New York with Billy for a special game of "New Year's Eve or Deformed.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "Julia Robert's Themed Obstacle Course", Would you Masturbate To Them?", and "Weekend at Bernies or Django Unchained"

Special Guest: Rachel Dratch

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "Pretty or Liar", Media Mogul or Rabbi", and "Quizzed in the Face"

Special Guest: Nas and Ashley Benson

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "Quizzed in the Face", "For a Dollar", "It Gets Better or Better Off Ted", "Billy"s Fashion Review", and "Its Spock! Do You Care?"

Special Guest: Zachary Quinto and Julie Klausner

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "Their Bodies, Themselves", "Tyler Perry Movie Quote or Applebees"

Special Guest: Maya Rudolph and Rashida Jones

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "Katharine McPhee or Nanny McPhee?", "Lil' Quizzed in the Face", "Smash or Great Gatsby", "For a Dollar", and "It's Debra Messing, You Gays!"

Special Guest: Debra Messing and Christian Borle

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "Who Dat?", "Quizzed in the Face", "For a Dollar", "Pink, Meryl Streep, or Who Cares?", "The Price feels so Right", and "This or Talk to Mario Lopez"

Special Guest: P!nk

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview:
Games Include: "For a Dollar", "Amateur Speed Sketching", "Gay or Not a Gay", "Space Craft or Reality Star", "Charlize, Tyrese, or Denise", "Feminine Product or ABC Family?", and "Kathy Bates or Gargamel"

episodes.name: Episode 12

Games Include: "For a dollar, "Quizzed in the Face", "Meredith Baxter Birney" and "Joseph Gordon-Levitt Pursuit"

Special Guest: Kristen Johnston

episodes.name: Olivia Wilde Is Very Pretty and You’re All Disgusting!, with Olivia Wilde
episodes.overview: Olivia Wilde takes on NYC with Billy for Olivia Wilde is Very Pretty. Other games include Humpty Dumpty or Mary J. Blige and You Can't Do That on TV: Adele Edition.

episodes.name: Cash Cow, with Lena Dunham vs. Elena
episodes.overview: Lena Dunham joins Billy on the streets for Steve Harvey or Harvey Milk, HBO Girls or Berenstain Bears. They even pair up for a special round of Cash Cow. Billy also plays Tyler Perry or Art and Screaming Tweets.

episodes.name: Billy Destroys a Car, with Neil Patrick Harris and Lindsay Lohan
episodes.overview: Billy and Neil Patrick Harris play a round of How I Met Your Mother: Lightning Round and Racist or Vegetarian? Lindsay Lohan later joins Billy for How I Destroyed Your Mother.

episodes.name: She Clucks or She Sucks?, with Seth Meyers
episodes.overview: Billy and Seth Meyers play Would Lena Dunham F*** that Cartoon Character? Billy also plays The Vaginal Four.

episodes.name: Would You Have Sex with Paul Rudd?, with Paul Rudd and Amy Poehler
episodes.overview: Paul Rudd joins Billy to play Would You Have Sex With Paul Rudd, Clueless or Childless and Would This Disappoint Bill Cosby? Other games include For a Dollar and Where Does This Stephen King Novel Take Place?

episodes.name: When the Easter Bunny Attacks!, with Joel McHale
episodes.overview: Joel McHale hits the streets with Billy to play the Mo'lympics. Also in this episode, Billy plays Easter Bunny Lightning Round and Buzz Feed List or Schindler's List.

episodes.name: It's Not Pitbull, It's Amy Poehler, with Amy Poehler
episodes.overview: Amy Poehler joins Billy for a special round of That's not Pitbull, It's Amy Poehler! and Chipmunk or Huxtable. Billy also plays Hope for Haiti or Jumanji.

episodes.name: Billy Loves Ratatouille, with Patton Oswalt
episodes.overview: Billy and Patton Oswalt team up to play Does Shakira Know About This? Billy also plays Queen Latifah or Brave Person?, Thanks for Sharing, Adam Levine and the Meryl-Go-Round obstacle course.

episodes.name: John Mayer or Pepé Le Pew, with Olivia Wilde and Sean Hayes
episodes.overview: Sean Hayes joins Billy to play Uninterested or Uncircumcised? and Who's the Most Famous Person on Sean Hayes' Phone? Olivia Wilde returns to play John Mayer or Pepé Le Pew? and Billy plays Actress Potato Head.

episodes.name: The Lana Del Race for the Cure, with Nick Offerman
episodes.overview: Nick Offerman joins Billy to play Is This Adorable? Other games include Lana del Race for the Cure, She's Talented or She Seems Nice? and a special round of For a Dollar.

episodes.name: Billy Helps Tina Fey Find a Friend
episodes.overview: Tina Fey joins host Billy Eichner as they hit the streets to find Tina a friend! Plus, Billy ambushes innocent civilians with the news that Emma Stone seems down to Earth! Other games include "For a Dollar" and a brand new "Lightning Round."

episodes.name: For A Dollar, It's Chris Pratt!
episodes.overview: In this week's episode, Billy introduces shocked New Yorkers to Jurassic World and Guardians of the Galaxy star, Chris Pratt! Plus, Billy finds out if Chris Pratt will be the next Indiana Jones and while playing "For A Dollar" offers random strangers on the street money if they relate to Ben Stiller!

episodes.name: Anna Kendrick's 'Tinder in Real Life' Lightning Round!
episodes.overview: Anna Kendrick helps Billy find love on the street, and Elena is the lifeline in a game of "Quizzed in the Face." Other games include "What Does Katy Perry's Cat Care About?" and "For A Dollar."

episodes.name: Billy Plays "Is Beyoncè Scared Of That?" with Jason Sudeikis!
episodes.overview: On this episode, Billy quizzes SNL and Horrible Bosses star Jason Sudeikis on what Beyoncé is probably scared of, then Jason helps Billy celebrate football season with a special "Bro Lightning Round" and a wicked Tailgating party. Plus an all new Lightning Round about Zombies and an explosive new game of "For A Dollar!"

episodes.name: Shondaland! With Bill Hader and Amy Sedaris
episodes.overview: In this week's jam-packed episode, Billy plays Make That Noise with SNL and Trainwreck star Bill Hader. Later, Billy plays Amateur Speed Sketching with Andy the film editor. Finally, Amy Sedaris joins Billy in one of the biggest obstacle courses the show has ever seen, Shondaland! Other games include For A Dollar and Streaming or Screaming?

episodes.name: Billy's Thanksgiving Parade!
episodes.overview: In this week's star-studded episode, Billy takes to the street with movie icon Meg Ryan for a special Thanksgiving For A Dollar game. Plus, Lucy Liu plays a brand new game called "You're an A**hole Billy or Screw You Lucy Liu!" Finally, Billy celebrates the season with his very own Thanksgiving Parade co-hosted by Katie Couric! Other games include "For A Dollar" and "Mark Twain or Eddie Murphy?"

episodes.name: The Julianne Moore Acting Attack!
episodes.overview: This week, Billy welcomes Academy Award-winning actress Julianne Moore to the show as they play a brand new game called "Hummus or Nipples?" Later, Billy is joined for Quizzed in the Face by everyone's favorite lifeline, Elena! Finally, Billy and Julianne Moore take to Times Square where Julianne ambushes innocent tourists with her acting ability. Other games include For A Dollar and The Gospel Choir Lightning Round.

episodes.name: Christmas on the Street with Will Farrell!
episodes.overview: Will Ferrell and Billy ambush New Yorkers with Christmas presents, holiday trivia and Yuletide cheer! Plus, SNL star Rachel Dratch takes on a new obstacle course called "Leah Remini's Escape from Scientology!" Later, Billy plays "Gay, Part Black or Cokehead?" with a girl who looks exactly like Pixar's Brave. Other games include "For A Dollar" and "Who Discovered This Person, Judd Apatow or P. Diddy"

episodes.name: Sex On The Street with Sarah Jessica Parker
episodes.overview: Sarah Jessica Parker joins Billy to give out shoes to anyone who can show their true appreciation for her work. Later, Billy plays "Kevin Hart or Gabby Giffords?" with plus-size musician, Tina! Finally, Sarah Jessica Parker plays "Santa's Reindeer or Sex App?" and wins a very unique prize.

episodes.name: Elena vs. Her Sister!
episodes.overview: Billy is joined by Juliana Margulies for a brand new game called "That's Not Sia, It's Juliana Margulies!"

episodes.name: Immigrant or Real American?" with Jon Hamm!
episodes.overview: Immigrant or Real American? With Jon Hamm!: Billy and Jon Hamm take to the streets to find out if anyone will have a threesome with them! Later, Billy plays "Immigrant or Real American?" with Kevin the bisexual office manager.

episodes.name: "Death Rogen" with Special Guest Seth Rogen!
episodes.overview: Billy hits the streets with Seth Rogen for a new segment called Death Rogen. Later, just in time for Thanksgiving, Billy and Sarah play What Does Michelle Rodriguez Bring to the Table?

episodes.name: Lupita Nyong'o: Bring the Pain
episodes.overview: This week Billy is joined by Oscar winner Lupita Nyong'o for the brand new game, "Gay or Old?" Later, everyone's favorite contestant, Elena, is back with a very patriotic Lightning Round!

episodes.name: Miracle on 34th Streep with Andy Samberg!
episodes.overview: Billy is joined by Andy Samberg to play the brand new game Was At My Wedding or Possibly Killed Tupac?

episodes.name: Aziz on the Street!
episodes.overview: This week Billy is joined by Aziz Ansari to play the brand new game Is This a Kanye West Quote or Not? Later, Rachel Dratch is back for an exhilarating obstacle course, Escape Margot Robbie's Moment!

episodes.name: Billy's Holiday Wonderland with Jacob Tremblay!
episodes.overview: Billy is joined for the first time by a child actor, the star of Room, Jacob Tremblay! Together, Jacob and Billy take to the street for a brand new Lightning Round.

episodes.name: Do Gay People Care About John Oliver? with John Oliver!
episodes.overview: This week, Billy and John Oliver take to the streets to find out if gay people care about him!

episodes.name: Curbside Conga Line with James Corden
episodes.overview: Billy takes the show on the road to LA with special guest James Corden! Emmy and Tony winner James Corden joins Billy as he desperately tries to appeal to the masses with Curbside Conga Line.

episodes.name: Super Sloppy Semi-Automatic Double Dare! with Keegan-Michael Key
episodes.overview: Billy is joined by Key and Peele star Keegan-Michael Key for the game Name 10 Gay People! Later, Billy is joined by aspiring actor Cameron to play Walking Dead or Talking Dead?

episodes.name: The NY Bubble with Stephen Colbert!
episodes.overview: In the season finale of Billy on the Street, Billy is joined by Emmy-winner Stephen Colbert to play La La Land or Nicki Minaj? Later, everyone's favorite contestant Elena is back to answer your Twitter questions!

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Billy Eichner takes to the streets to test the knowledge of unsuspecting pedestrians. Billy asks questions with his patented fast-paced and goofy style, covering topics from Lil' Wayne to Meryl Streep, for a fun time that is part game show and part comedy.

episodes.name: BILLY ON THE STREET with EMMA STONE!!!
episodes.overview: BILLY’S BACK!!! With the United States in a moment of great political chaos, Billy hits the streets with Academy Award winner Emma Stone to find out when Emma will finally join Instagram. And away we go!!!

episodes.name: Billy on the Street’s WITCH HUNT with TIFFANY HADDISH!
episodes.overview: Just in time for Halloween, Billy and comedy superstar Tiffany Haddish join forces to announce they'll be starring as witches in a "more inclusive" remake of the Halloween classic, Hocus Pocus! Watch as Billy, a gay man, and Tiffany, a black woman, hit the streets to find someone to play the third witch to round out their more diverse cast! Happy Halloween!

episodes.name: Billy on the Street with LIN-MANUEL MIRANDA!!!
episodes.overview: Billy hits the street with Hamilton star Lin-Manuel Miranda to ask New Yorkers if they’re happy and see if Lin-Manuel can inspire them and make them happier!

episodes.name: Billy on the Street with THE JONAS BROTHERS!!!!!
episodes.overview: Watch the one and only Billy on the Street (Billy Eichner) join forces with the Jonas Brothers to remind New Yorkers that the Jo Bros are back!

episodes.name: Billy on the Street with REESE WITHERSPOON!!!
episodes.overview: With Big Little Lies season 2 about to premiere, Billy hits the streets with Academy Award winner Reese Witherspoon to introduce New Yorkers to one of Hollywood’s biggest stars!

episodes.name: Billy on the Street with CHRIS EVANS!!! (And surprise guests!)
Episode 7
